captions.text: Hi, how are you doing?! My name is Otário (Sucker)!
And this bandit over here is Atílio Pereira!
He is the tipical “Fucking Politician”
A mediocre politician who doesn't know which side he fights for...
but that hides behind a speech of protecting the poor peoplem and the minorities...
while, actually, he just wants to enjoys the power and privileges,
and all this with our money!

There are people saying around that he is
the most dishonest politician of the country!
But I don't accept it!

'Cause he is trying to deceive you, to get 
elected with your vote!

And if that it weren't enough the damage that
he already does as a deputy...
this rascal wants to become, some day, the President of the country!
Don't fuck with me!

Beyond it, as all politician, he will try
to censor anyone who speaks ill of him...
or against his ideas.
Including me!

- Gabriel, what about censor some Canal do Otário (Sucker's Channel)
on the Internet...

- And he keeps slandering my madate as deputy,
speaking ill of him...
- I'm with a law project to censor him...
- But if this law get aproved...
- Could you hijack him and take his website down?!
From October 15, at 20:30 on FX Channel...
he will start making his pronouncements
Don't watch this crap!
- Atílio pereira, dick in your...!

“This content is not available in this 
country due to a complaint of defamation,

according to PL 171.69.2014, of the Fucking Politician FDPutado Atílio Pereira,
that prohibitis offenses
to his name, according to MARX CIVIL da internet” [== Translation - Vitor Utrila ==]
